name: UtilTest
description: Unit tests for various utility classes and methods in the Morel project.

test_cases.name: testTailList
test_cases.description: Tests the functionality of the TailList class, including size, get, set, add, addAll, clear, and isEmpty methods.

test_cases.name: testOrd
test_cases.description: Tests the forEachIndexed method from the Ord class, which iterates over a list with indices.

test_cases.name: testMapList
test_cases.description: Tests the creation and usage of a MapList, which is a list created by mapping a function over a range of indices.

test_cases.name: testFolder
test_cases.description: Tests the methods of the Folder class, which is used to combine AST expressions.

test_cases.name: testShorterThan
test_cases.description: Tests the shorterThan method from the Static class, which checks if an iterable is shorter than a given size.

test_cases.name: testFind
test_cases.description: Tests the find method from the Static class, which finds the index of the first element in a list that matches a predicate.

test_cases.name: testPos
test_cases.description: Tests the split method from the Pos class, which splits a string into a pair containing a substring and a Pos object representing a position in the file.

test_cases.name: testPower
test_cases.description: Tests the nextPowerOfTwo method from the Static class, which calculates the next power of two greater than or equal to a given integer.

test_cases.name: testTransform
test_cases.description: Tests the transform method from the Static class, which applies a function to each element of a list and returns the resulting list.

test_cases.name: testToString
test_cases.description: Tests the floatToString method from the Codes class, which converts a float to a string with a specific format.

test_cases.name: testFloatBit
test_cases.description: Tests the isNegative method from the Codes class, which checks if a float number is negative.

test_cases.name: testPairAllMatch
test_cases.description: Tests the anyMatch, allMatch, and noneMatch methods from the Pair class, which check if pairs of elements from two iterables match a given predicate.

test_cases.name: testRangeExtent
test_cases.description: Tests the iterable property of the RangeExtent class, which provides an iterable over a range of values.
